original_text: So God said to Noah, “I am going to put an end to all people, for the earth is filled with violence because of them. I am surely going to destroy both them and the earth.
korean_text: 하나님이 노아에게 이르시되 모든 혈육 있는 자의 포악함이 땅에 가득하므로 그 끝 날이 내 앞에 이르렀으니 내가 그들을 땅과 함께 멸하리라

sentences.original_text: I am going to put an end to all people
for the earth is filled with violence
sentences.korean_translation: 땅이 폭력으로 가득 차 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: I am surely going to destroy them
